alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 27 at 3:04PM MST until January 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Occasionally heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations around 1 inch for locations below 3000 feet. Above 3000 feet, additional accumulations between 2 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Pinehurst, Mullan, Wallace, St. Maries, Lookout Pass, Kellogg, Osburn, Fourth Of July Pass, Dobson Pass, and Fernwood. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. In addition, gusty winds on Saturday may lead to areas of blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
